    • 方法详细资料

      • getSliderValue

        public float getSliderValue()
        Gets the value of the slider.
        返回:
        A value that will under normal circumstances be between the slider's min and max values, unless it was manually set out of that range.

      • setSliderValue

        public void setSliderValue​(float value,
                           boolean notifyResponder)
        Sets the slider's value, optionally notifying the associated responder of the change.

      • getSliderPosition

        public float getSliderPosition()
        Gets the slider's position.
        返回:
        The position of the slider, which will under normal circumstances be between 0 and 1, unless it was manually set out of that range.

      • getHoverState

        protected int getHoverState​(boolean mouseOver)
        Returns 0 if the button is disabled, 1 if the mouse is NOT hovering over this button and 2 if it IS hovering over this button.
        覆盖:
        getHoverState 在类中 GuiButton

      • mouseDragged

        protected void mouseDragged​(Minecraft mc,
                            int mouseX,
                            int mouseY)
        Fired when the mouse button is dragged. Equivalent of MouseListener.mouseDragged(MouseEvent e).
        覆盖:
        mouseDragged 在类中 GuiButton

      • setSliderPosition

        public void setSliderPosition​(float position)
        Sets the position of the slider and notifies the associated responder of the change

      • mousePressed

        public boolean mousePressed​(Minecraft mc,
                            int mouseX,
                            int mouseY)
        Returns true if the mouse has been pressed on this control. Equivalent of MouseListener.mousePressed(MouseEvent e).
        覆盖:
        mousePressed 在类中 GuiButton

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased​(int mouseX,
                          int mouseY)
        Fired when the mouse button is released. Equivalent of MouseListener.mouseReleased(MouseEvent e).
        覆盖:
        mouseReleased 在类中 GuiButton
